Features

Accessible

Built with accessibility in mind and following best practices.

Mobile First

Mobile-first flexbox grid to build layouts of all shapes and sizes.

Font Awesome

More than 1200 vector icons from the web's most popular icon set.

Sass Files

Easily customize your site modifying the source scss files.

Gulp

Automated workflow for your development tasks.

Valid Code

W3C valid code to ensure the site works properly on all browsers.

Accessibility-ready

Boost theme is navigable with keyboard, ready for screen readers and uses a high color contrast ratio.

Read More about accessibility

Easy to customize

The theme includes a workflow to customize it easily, or you can simply use the static files.

Read More about the gulp workflow

Questions

Can I use this theme for my clients?

Yes, the Bootstrap Themes license allows you to use the product for personal or for a client.

What methods of payments are supported?

You can purchase the theme on Bootstrap Themes via any major credit/debit card (via Stripe) or with your Paypal account.

How do I get help with the theme?

Support for the theme is given for 6 months after you purchase the theme and is specific to questions around functionality, bugs, and basic implementation.

Are you ready to start?

Company
